description: Variation of condition 2 (development built in accordance with approved plans) to allow:The western most and middle houses have been moved south by 330mm and 300mm respectivelyThe kitchen of each house has been extended to meet the end of the west and east house walls and is now entirely glazed to the rear.  The east and west walls which face the neighbours are the same in length.The downstairs WC and utility room are now one room, and the location of this room has been slightly revised.The internal layout has been slightly revised, please compare drawingsThe window in the entrance lobby is narrower but extends up to first floor. The front (south entrance) door is now proposed to be wood and not entirely glazed The retaining walls in the rear gardens have been revisedThe parking and bike storage has been moved south to leave a 1m buffer to the gardens of neighbouring properties.Ground floor entrance lobby window extends to first floor to naturally light landing in addition to roof windows.Walk-in wardrobe space added next to balcony with additional window to rear.Roof windows slightly revised.Overall roof height of middle and westernmost house raised by 500mm from 8600 to 9100mm. Western most house steps up slightly more and both other houses step down as opposed to two easternmost houses being on the same level as before.Walk-in wardrobe and kitchen pushed out to end of east and west exterior walls.Kitchen glazing extended to edges.Walk-in wardrobe window added.Ground floor side elevation windows are a slightly different shape and in a slightly different position.Ground floor window extended to first floor to naturally light double height space.Roof windows revisedof Full Planning Permission reference 17/4747 dated 21 February, 2018, for Erection of 3 two storey detached dwellinghouses to rear of 12 and 14 St Andrews Avenue, with provision for 4 car parking spaces, cycle and bin storage, installation of new service road between 12 and 14 onto St Andrews Avenue and associated landscaping
site_name: Land rear of 12-14 St Andrews Avenue, St Andrews Avenue, Wembley
